Basic:
const Basic = () => (
  <Editable activationMode="dblclick" placeholder="enter a value" value="Chakra">
    {(state) => (
      <>
        <EditableLabel>Label</EditableLabel>
        <EditableArea>
          <EditableInput />
          <EditablePreview />
        </EditableArea>
        <EditableControl>
          {state().isEditing ? (
            <>
              <EditableSubmitTrigger>
                <button>Save</button>
              </EditableSubmitTrigger>
              <EditableCancelTrigger>
                <button>Cancel</button>
              </EditableCancelTrigger>
            </>
          ) : (
            <EditableEditTrigger>
              <button>Edit</button>
            </EditableEditTrigger>
          )}
        </EditableControl>
      </>
    )}
  </Editable>
)
